This is my first map, it looks abit like greatriver but thats what i like about it. funny thingy is that you are actually able to kill some one. and to get out of jail you need to shoot the red big button in the middle  of the room and then jump before you turn left by the door. this idea whas given by my friend execute.

Basically, this is a surf map that has a button that you may shoot or press to get your self out of jail, or if some one presses the kill button, you begin to freeze to death and it narrows your chances of getting out. This map has serveral weapons scattered on platforms, XL course, SL course and of course Awp, or the campers heaven. This map consists of many teleports AND THIS IS MY FIRST SURF MAP!! enjoy 

please note it is still in beta, but it is most functional *use sv_airaccelerate 100* and also if you find any glitches or errors please tell me!!!!!!

surf_frost is a Tier 1 Linear map with 8 Bonuses.

The intention of this map was to create a very old-style feel for a surf map. This was done with easy yet fast obstacles and turns, with relatively small ramps of varying sizes.

In the hub you can find the 8 bonuses. Bonuses 1-6 are labeled at their respective doors, bonus 7 is labeled as "1.6" at its door, and bonus 8 is an unlabeled door on the outside of the hub and can be seen from spawn.

Bonus 1 is made by pretzL and bonus 2 is made by Ret_rded aka Sam.

The bonuses are meant to be a wide mix of styles such as fast strafing bonuses, tougher unit-check bonuses, and smooth maxvel bonuses.

Bonus 7 is known as the "1.6 bonus" as it was intended to replicate the old style of cs 1.6 surf / kz. With that being said, it is also meant to be played with autohop and essentially every skip you can find is allowed.

Thanks to everyone who tested and special thanks to Sam for helping me not mess up all the filters in my map.

Huge thanks to EarthwormEd for the showcase video:


Thanks to everyone who plays this map.. Enjoy!

This map is the product of combining time, effort, blood, semen and brawn to pump out the greatest surf map of 2015. All contributors are owed their fair share of the credits for this map, as it would not exist without them. Especially Wirelezz, thank you for making this map. Thank you for everyone who made content within this map but may not be properly credited. If you're not listed please let me know and I'll list you as you should be.

20 Stages. 7 Boners.

More pictures here - http://forums.solidsurf.info/index.php/topic,3922.0.html

Official video here - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LToim8jNzuA

Hey guys! First of all, this is my first surfing map I made so be gentle (^^').


<fieldset><legend>Surf_freedom_v8:</legend>
- Game: Counter Strike: Source

- Sub-mod: Surf

- Players: 32v32 (max. 64)

- Info: Basic textures with freshing lighting and pleasent challenges.

- Tips: Secret buttons, secret buyzone and room, locked powerfull weapons in each zone (Pro and Noob), etc.
</fieldset>

<fieldset><legend>Screenshots:</legend>
- Number of screenshots: 6

- Screenshot A: Phase 1

- Screenshot B: Spawns and Top

- Screenshot C: Phase 2

- Screenshot D: Pro zone

- Screenshot E: Noob zone

- Screenshot F: Jail Top (only for Pro zone) and Jail Down (for jaileds and around for Noob zone)
</fieldset>

Well we sure hope you find this map good to play on and hopefully with good feedback we will continue mapping for surf.

Cheers, 
Biohazard.pt (Map author) and Volk.pt (suggestions guy ^^)

I am proud to FINALLY release surf_freedom, my second ever map release :D

This has undergone about 777777777 billion compiles, and I'm happy to say that this is the final product of god-knows how many hours of work!

Map is 5 staged, with a medium difficulty. This is the normal version of the map, intended to be played on regular servers, NOT TIMER SERVERS!

**I WILL BE RELEASING AN _njv VERSION OF THE MAP SOON!** However if you think you can make it work yourself, go ahead.

I've added one nifty little secret in, try and find it ;)

Hope you enjoy the map! I sure as hell have enjoyed making and testing the map!

Massive credits to everybody that's tested the map, given me feedback and everyone in general I play with :D

If you're interested at all, I would love to make a surf_ map collab with some other people, so add me on steam: **lordofboobs**



Enjoy the map :D

IMPORTANT 04/28/17:

If you downloaded the map before, please be sure you have the latest version, it solves many issues.

Surf Forgotten is my third surf map. The main goal was to make an easy linear map, but I ended up finding some sorts of trick surfs that could be cool in it. I took advantage of this map to experiment many concepts that were new to me such as: reflections, HDR, opened map, easy linear surfing, multiple use of same ramps, 3D skybox, fog, etc. It was really fun to create. I have no expectation from this because it is not a common surf map (as the design lol) and it is very short as a linear, but I hope you will enjoy it as much as I enjoyed doing it! oooooh

Map: tier 1, linear, 6 bonuses.

Download link (css): http://gamebanana.com/maps/194789
Download link (csgo): http://gamebanana.com/maps/194790

Showcase video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XBuwBsSPDqU

Thanks to sneak, noobre and marcowmadeira for helping me on some issues.

Credits to TopHATTwaffle and Komaokc for the assets (and all the others too).

Hello everyone,
I'm proud to finally present my newest creation 'Surf\_Forbidden\_Ways\_Reloaded'. This map has been one of the longest projects I've had so far. More than two years have passed, since my friend JackTheStripper had the idea to remake this map and gave me some ideas. In those two years I've optimized the map in every aspect. The map has been re-created from scratch and has many new ways - but still the basic idea of Forbidden Ways:
With more than twenty secrets to explore - some harder, some easier - and the typical 'Get a gun, surf to jail' principle, you'll have HOURS of varied gameplay. The far you surf, the better weapons you get, but if you fail, you'll end up being in jail.

Information:

  • More than twenty secrets to discover.
  • Beautiful redesign and awesome ambience.
  • More than 3.5 minutes of total surfing-time.
  • Teamplay map: Some places are only reachable with the help of one of your teammates.
  • Advanced gameplay: Some parts of the map will change from time to time. Get advantages by using secret ways and special weapons.
  • Balanced complexity of the surfing parts for beginners and experts.
  • Now there is a way to get out of jail without any help.
  • Optimized for Mods (such as RPG and DM).
  • I've been 0.7% below max_planes, so please note how difficult it was to add details.
-Krusty
Dear noclippers and spectators,
I have spent a lot of time to make this map as entertaining as possible by creating all the secrets for you to figure out. So please don't spoil it and find them without tricks

If you like this submission, "Say thanks" to the left.

Surf_forbidden_tomb4

Well, my lastest map, and 100% sure that is my last work as mapper. I am done with mapping because i can't be more creative and/or original with this tool. Other reason is that i lost a lot of time making maps, i liked it, but i want to dedicate more time to my family, friends and girlfriend.

The map has 1:45 (aprox.) mins of speedsurfing... I allways wanted to make a non-stop surfing map, but i wasnt inspired. Now i could, and here is my best map ever.

I have 150 fps more or less in all the map...I promise i tried to optimize it with area_portals and hints and func_details, but its is a BIG room and it creates a lot of visleafs...sorry about fps's (PD: i have no video card, so i guess it is not so bad about fps's)

I have to give credits to Black Sheep, for make the bomb model, and specially to Katas. Katas made the awesome and ultra-complex jail system. I have to say thanks to few people that helped me with the map, like VAS clan ( Viciados al surf ), a spanish surf clan.

When you are teleported to jail, in 3 seconds, a few bombs ( Number fo players/2 ) are given randomly, and you have to pass it touching other guys. A red fade means that you have the bomb, Blue fade, menas you have not the bomb. You have 10 secs to pass it, or you will die :D.

This map ends [b][size=12pt]DEFINITELY[/size][/b] with an awesome saga of maps that gave me the oportunity of grow as mapper. Thank you very much to Riddler, and Spliff.

This map ends with my work as mapper. Inside this 4th tomb i say goodbay to everyone, but you have to beat the map to see the end ^^.

I want to say thanks to that people that helped me a lot with the world of hammer editor: silverlol, untouchable, bravesurf, helix...and more, but specially Sangre, and people like billy has contributed a lot encouraging me to make more maps.

I cant leave mapping without give thanks to solidsurf forums, because i have learnt a lot here, and a lot of people helped me when i needed.

I am going to erase all the source sdk files, and i will leave SS forums. The first days od the tomb4 release, i will sign in the forum to see your coments ^^, but that's all.

Well that's all...i hope you can forgive my english fails. And i hope you enjoy this map as i enjoyed creating it.

Goodbay to everyone ^^.

Rapsodia

Hi

Welcome to Surf Forbidden Tomb

This is a new and exciting skill surf map designed and made by Spliff and myself.

It contains 8 levels and 2 "jails".

Along the way, try to find the 8 secret buttons that will unlock the secret tomb of Anubis. Can you find them?

Thanks to Target Practice for the use of his Fallback system. Every fail will result in 5 hp being removed from you health. To gain 100 health once more, simply push the button at the start each level.

The map has also been designed with Surf Infamous' unique hide and seek game. Simply hide yourselves throughout the levels as the person who finishes the map tries to find you :D

Hope you enjoy it

Spliff
Riddler

This map is semi-long it's rebel-resistance length so no amount of screenshots can tell you how it looks, so here's a video

<object width="425" height="350"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/58rS0OSVwDw"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/58rS0OSVwDw" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" width="425" height="350"></embed></object>

This is not, I repeat, NOT a rip a off of rebel resistance. The only thing that is similar is the teleporters and the textures.

This features an anti-spawn camper spawn area. I created this map because a lot of people in my clan are complaining about spawn campers, thus, this is the solution. Enjoy!

EDIT: lol, is this the highest rated leaked map on FPSBanana?

A quick guide on how to do the map: Don't get confused, focus on one route, and just follow it. 

This map is slightly complicated to get into, due to the number of different routes that are possible, but once you get a good overview, you can try combining them in different ways. I have a few ideas what the exact fastest route will be, but I'm not quite sure between two of them.      
Regardless, this is the product of a long and tedious mapping experience, running alongside the relatively newly released bhop awful2. 

I hope you enjoy the map.     
~Aux

**UPDATE:** Added KSF triggers and filters.

************************************************************* README FIRST: I was bored and had no real new ideas for my current wip: surf japan remake. So i played all my surfmaps and the fizzycave was funny but short and had no lightning. So i edited it for our server and now its real different from the original i think... ************************************************************* MAP INFOS: - 48 spawns - lightning - extended the map - complete new jail - new weapons - extras on long path - secret buyzone - ambient sounds ************************************************************* CREDITS: Blobby Mahn did the original one so thanks to him ( i hope to see more from u ^^ ) *************************************************************

hdr :) (its compiled for ldr/hdr so if you dont have hdr you can still play it)

Well this level is a little different, the idea is to get the objects to fall on other people (i wouldnt be the first person off the ramp).
you start off with pumps and scouts. keep your eye out for the health rechargers.
since its snowing ouside i figured i'd add a touch of winter to the end part.
if you fall outside of spawn be careful when your leaving the water :)
vmf is included for those that want it.
